long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Everyone wants to make data driven decisions. But with too much data available across many applications itâ€™s challenging for team members to use it effectively. This results in bad business decisions being made - which could have been avoided if the right data had been considered. The Buj platform delivers the right data, to the right person, at the right time; it further enables users to organically collaborate with teams and data to make decisions quickly and take action. This results in higher productivity, and enterprises making better decisions faster. 

With Buj plugin you can easily transform information into Buj data from any Chrome tab.
